sentences.english: They need to have a high rate of interest in order to pull in money from investors.
sentences.chinese: 要吸引投資者進行投資，他們需要有高利率。

sentences.english: Usury of the Gansu-Ningxia-Qinghai rural in Republican China aroused a multifaceted social impact.
sentences.chinese: 高利貸對民國時期甘寧青社會的深刻影響是多方面的。

sentences.english: Usury is interest in excess of a legal rate.
sentences.chinese: 高利貸是指超過法定利率取息。

sentences.english: The approriate discount rate for this investment is 12 percent.
sentences.chinese: 顯而易見，這個投資的回報率是12%的高利率。

sentences.english: He said the bill fails to address usury issues.
sentences.chinese: 他說，這項法案沒有解決高利貸問題。

sentences.english: Bank of England raises interest rates as economy sizzles.
sentences.chinese: 經濟形式良好，英國央行調高利率。

sentences.english: Loan sharks often use gangsters to put the screws on people who do not meet their payment deadlines.
sentences.chinese: 高利貸者常常利用流氓對不按期還錢的人們進行威脅。

sentences.english: Many small and medium-size Chinese businesses are highly leveraged and have to scramble for cash.
sentences.chinese: 很多中國的中小型公司都借高利貸得去拼搶現金。

sentences.english: All in all, loan sharking is a offense.
sentences.chinese: 總之，放高利貸是一種犯罪行爲。

sentences.english: Usury laws would cripple not only government debt, but also other forms of borrowing.
sentences.chinese: 反高利貸法阻礙的不僅是政府債務，還有其他的借貸。

sentences.english: While the stone village folk usurious namely thenceforth begins.
sentences.chinese: 而石集鄉的民間高利貸也就是從那時開始。

sentences.english: Shi Guobao was considered a folk usurious agitation" claw king".
sentences.chinese: 石國豹被認爲是民間高利貸風潮的“爪王”。

sentences.english: The higher interest rate would sponge up a large number of deposits.
sentences.chinese: 較高利率會吸引大量的存款。

sentences.english: Pope Gregory XIII mandated a reform to the calendar; his Gregorian calendar approximated the mean tropical year as 365.2425 days.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬教皇格里高利十三世授權改革曆法。

sentences.english: Under such circumstances, there is no real estate conditions were usurious .
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，沒有房地產條件高利貸。

sentences.english: He went to the money lenders and borrowed on ruinous terms.
sentences.chinese: 他去跟放高利貸的人借錢，訂了使他破產的契約。

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
to use gain as a lure
